item.title: CVE-2022-4897|2024-08-03T01:55:46.053Z -- unknown -- backupbuddy
item.description: The BackupBuddy WordPress plugin before 8.8.3 does not sanitise and escape some parameters before outputting them back in various places, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
